title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the VRHomeDesigner platform, including user stories, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and any constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the virtual reality engine, 3D modeling components, user interface, and backend services. The architecture should consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. It should also define the communication protocols and data flow between different components, with a focus on using modern, efficient technologies such as WebXR for VR and Blender/Three.js for 3D modeling. Additional areas of consideration include accessibility, cross-platform compatibility, and integration with real-time rendering and physics engines.

title: Develop Virtual Reality Engine
description: Implement the virtual reality engine that will power the 3D visualization and user interactions within the VRHomeDesigner platform.

title: Implement 3D Modeling and Customization
description: Develop the components and tools for creating, importing, and customizing 3D models of homes, furniture, and other design elements.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for the user interface and experience, ensuring intuitive navigation and seamless interaction with the virtual reality environment.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services required for user authentication, data storage, and any other necessary functionality.

title: Integrate Virtual Reality Engine and Backend
description: Integrate the virtual reality engine with the backend services, ensuring seamless communication and data exchange between the two components.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the platform is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as user authentication, data encryption, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a continuous integration and deployment pipeline to automate the build, testing, and deployment processes for the VRHomeDesigner platform.

title: Create Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the VRHomeDesigner platform.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, developer documentation, and any other necessary documentation for the VRHomeDesigner platform.
